summary: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.
cast: Bruce Dern|Cliff Potts|Ron Rifkin|Jesse Vint|Mark Persons|Steven Brown|Cheryl Sparks|Larry Whisenhunt|Joseph Campanella|Roy Engel
keywords: male protagonist|dying words|death|psychotronic film|aerial camera shot
title: Naves misteriosas
